member.name: SYNCMGR_SYNC_CONTROL_FLAGS.SYNCMGR_SCF_NONE
member.summary: Sync all items, regardless of whether they were just synced.

member.name: SYNCMGR_SYNC_CONTROL_FLAGS.SYNCMGR_SCF_IGNORE_IF_ALREADY_SYNCING
member.summary: Sync only items that are not currently syncing.

member.name: SYNCMGR_SYNC_CONTROL_FLAGS.SYNCMGR_SCF_VALID
member.summary: A mask used to retrieve or verify valid flags.
